original: @ga  @#/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa//🔽rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa_/_@##/_/om swa sti/_rgya gar🔽skad du/_badzra yo gi ni lu ga b+ha ba/_bod skad du/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas
analyzed: @ga  @#/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa_/_@##/_/om swa sti/_rgya gar skad du/_badzra yo gi ni lu ga b+ha ba/_bod skad du/_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas
translated: The Hidden Practice of Vajrayoginī🔽The Hidden Practice of Vajrayoginī🔽Svasti! In Sanskrit: Vajrayoginīlugbabhava. In Tibetan: rDo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa. Homage to Oṃ Vajravārāhī!

original: pa'i sgom pa/_om rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/da ni rdo rje phag mo yi/_/
analyzed: pa'i sgom pa/_om rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/da ni rdo rje phag mo yi/_/
translated: Now, I will perfectly explain the practice of Vajravārāhī

original: sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad/_/sems can 'khor ba sgrol ba'i phyir/_/di
analyzed: sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad/_/sems can 'khor ba sgrol ba'i phyir/_/di
translated: in order to liberate sentient beings from saṃsāra.🔽This was composed by Dinakarapāda.

original: na ka ras brtshams par bya/_/yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su/_lus drang por
analyzed: na ka ras brtshams par bya/_/yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su/_lus drang por
translated: In a place that is pleasing to the mind, straighten the body

original: bsrang nas 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste/_dag pa rnam par thar pa gsum/_/
analyzed: bsrang nas 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste/_dag pa rnam par thar pa gsum/_/
translated: and meditate in the following way: The wise one should meditate on the three pure liberations.

original: blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/_/de nas skad cig gcig de la/_/lha nyid du
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/_/de nas skad cig gcig de la/_/lha nyid du
translated: Then, in that very instant, imagine oneself as the deity.

original: ni rnam par brtag_//byang chub tshan dan chu shing dang /_/dpal gyi 'bras bu
analyzed: ni rnam par brtag_//byang chub tshan dan chu shing dang /_/dpal gyi 'bras bu
translated: The plantain tree, the bamboo, and the glorious fruit

original: nyi ma zla/_/me dang sgra gcan steng na mdog_/sna tshhogs 'dzin ma dmar mo
analyzed: nyi ma zla/_/me dang sgra gcan steng na mdog_/sna tshhogs 'dzin ma dmar mo
translated: The sun, moon, fire, and Rahu are above, and she is red,🔽holding various things.

original: che/_/dmar ba'i spyan gsum kha spu dang /_/ka pa la bsnams gar mdzad ma/_/🔽thod 'phreng phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/_/skra grol kha tam ga dang 'dus/_/g.yas su
analyzed: che/_/dmar ba'i spyan gsum kha spu dang /_/ka pa la bsnams gar mdzad ma/_/ thod 'phreng phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/_/skra grol kha tam ga dang 'dus/_/g.yas su
translated: She has three red eyes, a beard, and holds a skull cup and dances.🔽She has a garland of skulls and is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments, her hair is loose, and she embraces Khaṭvāṅga.

original: sngon mo gri thod dang /_/da ma ru kha tam ga bsnams pa/_/g.yon du dkar mo
analyzed: sngon mo gri thod dang /_/da ma ru kha tam ga bsnams pa/_/g.yon du dkar mo
translated: To her right is blue Vajravārāhī, holding a flaying knife and skull cup and playing a ḍamaru and khaṭvāṅga.🔽To her left is white Buddhadākinī,🔽holding a lasso, flaying knife, and khaṭvāṅga.

original: zhags pa gri/_/chos 'byung rdo rje rtshe gcig 'dzin/_/nyi ma ro yi steng na
analyzed: zhags pa gri/_/chos 'byung rdo rje rtshe gcig 'dzin/_/nyi ma ro yi steng na
translated: They sit on sun and corpse seats,🔽all blazing with light.

original: bzhugs/_/kun kyang rab tu 'bar ba'o/_/sangs rgyas rab:sngags rnams
analyzed: bzhugs/_/kun kyang rab tu 'bar ba'o/_/sangs rgyas rab:sngags rnams
translated: The buddhas, mantras, and lights🔽are beautified by the three vajras of the crown.

original: snang ma/_/dbu rgyan rdo rje gsum gyis mdzes/_/rtsha rnams gsum la yi ge rnams//
analyzed: snang ma/_/dbu rgyan rdo rje gsum gyis mdzes/_/rtsha rnams gsum la yi ge rnams//
translated: The three channels are adorned with the syllables🔽oṃ and hūṃ.

original: o hu~m gis rab tu brgyan/_/lte ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/_/rang
analyzed: o hu~m gis rab tu brgyan/_/lte ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/_/rang
translated: The light from the navel draws in the buddhas🔽and their mantras into the wheel.

original: sngags 'khor lo la gzhug bya/_/pho/_yang yang lha yi de nyid dran byas te/_/
analyzed: sngags 'khor lo la gzhug bya/_/pho/_yang yang lha yi de nyid dran byas te/_/
translated: Again and again, recall the deity’s reality.

original: mchan khungs bsdams nas gsang sngags rgyal po bzla/_/gang 'di rnam mi rtog
analyzed: mchan khungs bsdams nas gsang sngags rgyal po bzla/_/gang 'di rnam mi rtog
translated: Recite the king of secret mantra🔽with the mind of nonconceptuality.

original: pa'i sems kyis so/_/'di ni lha yi de nyid nye bar dmigs/_/lte ba'i dbus
analyzed: pa'i sems kyis so/_/'di ni lha yi de nyid nye bar dmigs/_/lte ba'i dbus
translated: This is the observation of the reality of the deity.🔽If one observes a red drop

original: na thig le ni/_/kha dog dmar ba nyid dmigs na/_/rlung ni yang dag bsdam
analyzed: na thig le ni/_/kha dog dmar ba nyid dmigs na/_/rlung ni yang dag bsdam
translated: in the center of the navel,🔽one should bind the vāyu.🔽The belly should not expand,

original: par bya/_/lto ba 'phel ba ma yin zhing /_/rlung ni kha sbyor nyid du bya/_/ze'u
analyzed: par bya/_/lto ba 'phel ba ma yin zhing /_/rlung ni kha sbyor nyid du bya/_/ze'u
translated: and the vāyu should be joined.🔽The bindu is accomplished in the lotus.

original: 'bru'i nang du bde ba sgrub/_/dpral ba mgrin pa mthar snying ga_/thig le thim
analyzed: 'bru'i nang du bde ba sgrub/_/dpral ba mgrin pa mthar snying ga_/thig le thim
translated: The drops dissolve in the forehead, throat, and heart,🔽and there is the clear light.🔽One should enter into the session

original: pa 'od gsal ba'o/_/dag pa gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/_/thun mtshhams 'jug pa
analyzed: pa 'od gsal ba'o/_/dag pa gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/_/thun mtshhams 'jug pa
translated: through the yoga of the three purities.

original: nyid du bya/_/sha lnga bdud rtshi lngar bcas pa/_/zla ba rdo rje om yig gis/_/🔽sbyang zhing spel ba la sogs bya/_/a ka ro sogs gsang sngags kyis/_/gtor
analyzed: nyid du bya/_/sha lnga bdud rtshi lngar bcas pa/_/zla ba rdo rje om yig gis/_/ sbyang zhing spel ba la sogs bya/_/a ka ro sogs gsang sngags kyis/_/gtor
translated: The five meats and the five nectars are purified by the moon, vajra, and oṃ.🔽They are increased and so on.🔽The torma is offered to the buddhas with the secret mantra of akaro and so on.

original: ma sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/_/mchod cing gsol nas gshegs su gsol/_/
analyzed: ma sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/_/mchod cing gsol nas gshegs su gsol/_/
translated: After making offerings and supplicating, one should request departure.

original: he ru ka'am rdo rje sems/_/yang na lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis/_/phyi rol 'byung po
analyzed: he ru ka'am rdo rje sems/_/yang na lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis/_/phyi rol 'byung po
translated: one should please the external spirits.

original: rnams dges bya/_/ha ha'i bsnyems bcas 'jigs med pas/_/rang gi stan
analyzed: rnams dges bya/_/ha ha'i bsnyems bcas 'jigs med pas/_/rang gi stan
translated: With the arrogance of “ha ha” and fearlessness,🔽one should recite on one’s seat

original: du bzlas pa dang /_/pho zhes yang yang gar stabs bya/_/tshhes bcu la sogs🔽dus rnams la/_/gzhon nu ma mchod bsgrub par bya/_/bu mo gsum mam bdun
analyzed: du bzlas pa dang /_/pho zhes yang yang gar stabs bya/_/tshhes bcu la sogs dus rnams la/_/gzhon nu ma mchod bsgrub par bya/_/bu mo gsum mam bdun
translated: and dance with the gait of a hero again and again.🔽One should practice the worship of the maidens🔽at the ten times, and so on.🔽Having completed the worship of three or seven

original: dag la/_/mchod pa rdzogs pa brtshams byas nas/_/byin gyis brlabs pa de ru
analyzed: dag la/_/mchod pa rdzogs pa brtshams byas nas/_/byin gyis brlabs pa de ru
translated: maidens, one should also complete the consecration.🔽Alternatively, it is with the vajra dust.🔽The bali with the five lamps

original: brtshams/_/yang na rdo rje'i rdul gyi'o/_/sgron ma lnga bcas gtor ma ni/_/lha
analyzed: brtshams/_/yang na rdo rje'i rdul gyi'o/_/sgron ma lnga bcas gtor ma ni/_/lha
translated: is for the goddesses.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa/
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa/
translated: The hidden meditation of Vajrayoginī🔽is with the mantra of the four yoginīs.

original: mo bzhi yi sngags bcas pas/_/slob ma'i 'khor lo bzhir reg nas/_/'byung
analyzed: mo bzhi yi sngags bcas pas/_/slob ma'i 'khor lo bzhir reg nas/_/'byung
translated: Having touched the four cakras of the disciple,🔽one should remove the obstacles of the four elements.

original: ba bzhi yi bar chad bsal/_/yul dang lha sku sngags thig le/_/rim pa yis ni
analyzed: ba bzhi yi bar chad bsal/_/yul dang lha sku sngags thig le/_/rim pa yis ni
translated: The object, the deity’s form, the mantra, and the bindu🔽are empty in stages.🔽There is no entry into this.

original: stong pa'o/_/'di la 'jug pa yod ma yin/_/dkyil 'khor dbang bskur nyid
analyzed: stong pa'o/_/'di la 'jug pa yod ma yin/_/dkyil 'khor dbang bskur nyid
translated: The empowerment of the maṇḍala

original: kyi phyir/_/hum stong pa chos kyi 'byung gnas dbus/_/lha sku bum pa'i chu yis🔽bkru/_/bla ma yi ni rkyang ma'i rlung /_/ra sa nas rngub d+hu tir gzhug_/
analyzed: kyi phyir/_/hum stong pa chos kyi 'byung gnas dbus/_/lha sku bum pa'i chu yis bkru/_/bla ma yi ni rkyang ma'i rlung /_/ra sa nas rngub d+hu tir gzhug_/
translated: wash with the vase water of the deity’s form.🔽The vāyu of the lalanā of the guru is inhaled from the rasanā and is inserted into the avadhūti.

original: mchan khungs bcings nas tshan+na li/_/spar zhing thig le rlung dag gi/_/dga'
analyzed: mchan khungs bcings nas tshan+na li/_/spar zhing thig le rlung dag gi/_/dga'
translated: Binding the armpits, the uvula is extended, and the bindu is drawn up by the vāyu.🔽The joy of the bindu and vāyu is accomplished.

original: ba rab sgrub de nas gzhan/_/zung 'jug ye shes bshad par bya/_/de ltar
analyzed: ba rab sgrub de nas gzhan/_/zung 'jug ye shes bshad par bya/_/de ltar
translated: Then, after that, the gnosis of union will be explained.🔽Through the virtue that I have accumulated

original: mdor bsdus sbyar ba las/_/dge ba bdag gis gang bsags pa/_/de yis🔽sems can ma lus pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du shog_/slob dpon chen po
analyzed: mdor bsdus sbyar ba las/_/dge ba bdag gis gang bsags pa/_/de yis sems can ma lus pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du shog_/slob dpon chen po
translated: by condensing it in this way,🔽may all sentient beings become Vajrasattva.

original: gup+ta na tha dang /_rgyal khams pas bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: gup+ta na tha dang /_rgyal khams pas bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: This was translated by the great master Guptanātha and Gyal-kha-pa.
